Title: A Beautiful Brooch
Description:
It is a very old, antique brooch with very detailed molding and filigree worked into the edges. It looks very valuable.

There's only one person who keeps losing jewelry to furry hooligans, and she would probably want to see this heirloom returned.
ObjectivesText: Bring the Beautiful Brooch to Tina Mudclaw at Haohan's House or Halfhill Market in the Valley of the Four Winds.
